overlay.upBadNameAlert: Valid characters are: A-Za-z0-9_-+.()[]{}. Please rename the file and try again.
overlay.existsConfirm: An overlay image with that name already exists on the server. If the images have the same width and height, the image on the server will be replaced.
overlay.errAccesDeniedSubmit:
An error occurred during submit. This is probably caused by an incorrect path or filename.
Error description:
overlay.errDescSubmit:
An error occurred during submit.
Error description:
overlay.remConfirm: Are you sure you want to permanently remove
overlay.remBtnStatTxt: Delete the selected image from the server
overlay.alrt1aTxt: Unsupported file type. The supported file type is Windows 24-bit BMP.
overlay.alrt1bTxt:
Unsupported file type. The supported file type is Windows 24-bit BMP with a maximum of 250 unique colors.
The width and height of the overlay image will be padded to a size that is evenly divisible by 32. The padded width * height must not exceed 135000 pixels.
overlay.alrt1cTxt: Unsupported file type. The supported file types are Windows 4-bit BMP, Windows 24-bit BMP and OS/2 4-bit BMP.
overlay.alrt2Txt: Bad image dimensions. Both width and height of the overlay image must be divisible by 4.
overlay.alrt3Txt: Invalid palette value. The value of the invisible color must be on the form RRGGBB where RR is the hexadecimal value for the red component, GG the hexadecimal value for the green component, and BB the hexadecimal value for the blue component. E.g. FF0A13.
overlay.alrt4Txt: Internal error. Refer to the error logs for more information.
overlay.alrt6Txt: The file upload failed, probably due to too large file. Refer to the error logs for more information.
overlay.alrt7Txt: BMP file not found. Make sure you have specified a valid path.
overlay.alrt9Txt: Failed to set overlay image. Refer to the error logs for more information.
overlay.hlpTxt: Click here for help on this page
overlay.selOvTxt: Select the overlay to use for all sources.

ovl_settings_16.hlpTxt: Click here for help on this page
ovl_settings_16.noteTxt: Note: If none of the 16 colors is set to transparent, the 16th color in the uploaded image will automatically be replaced with transparency.
